feature_model.name: DELL Laptop/Notebook Computers

meta.data: This feature models describes the features of DELL Laptop/Notebook Products

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Dell Laptops/Notebooks :m Product Category (productcategory) :g [1,1] : Mini Notebooks (mininotebooks) : Inspiron Laptops (inspironlaptops) : Studio Laptops (studiolaptops) : XPS Laptops (xpslaptops) : Adamo (adamo) : Studio XPS Laptops (studioxpslaptops) :m Operating System (operatingsystem) :g [1,1] : Vista with Downgrade to XP (vistawithdowngradetoxp) : Windows Vista 64 bit (windowsvista64bit) : Windows XP Home (windowsxphome) : Ubuntu Linux (ubuntulinux) :m Hard Drive (harddrive) :g [1,1] : 500GB (hd500gb) : 320GB (hd320gb) : 250GB (hd250gb) : 160GB (hd160gb) : 128GB Solid State (hd128gbsolidstate) : 120GB (hd120gb) : 80GB (hd80gb) :o Optical Drive (opticaldrive) :g [1,1] : CD_DVD +RW (cddvdrw) : DVD-ROM Drive and DVD+-RW (dvdromdriveanddvdrw) : DVD+-RW and CD-RW Combo (dvdrwandcdrwcombo) : Blu Ray Disc (bluraydisc) :m Laptop Weight (laptopweight) :g [1,1] : Ultra Light (ultralight) : Light (light) : Desktop Replacement (desktopreplacement) :m Memory (memory) :g [1,1] : More than 4GB (morethan4g) : 4GB (mem4gb) : 3GB (mem3gb) : 2GB (mem2gb) : 1GB (mem1gb) :m Processor (processor) :g [1,1] : Intel Core 2 Duo (intelcore2duo) : Intel Pentium Dual core (intelpentiumdualcore) : Intel Celeron (intelceleron) : Intel Atom (intelatom) :m Price (price) :g [1,1] : Less than $400(lessthanus400) : $400 - $800 (us400us800) : $800 - $1200 (us800us1200) : More than $1200 (morethanus1200)
